long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Autofill Job Form extension is designed to make job applications faster and hassle-free. Simply log in to your existing Uplers ATS account or create a new one if needed, and your profile data will automatically sync. Once logged in, the extension enables you to auto-fill application forms on various job boards, saving you valuable time and effort. Forget the repetitive task of filling out the same details over and over—this extension simplifies your job search process so you can focus on finding the perfect role.
